name: Lonesome Hunter
description:
WASD to move. 

Mouse to aim.

LMB to shoot and skip dialogue.

Changelog:
  • v. 000 - initial release for LD Jam
  • v. 001 - minor bugfixes (edited enemies' blinking and speed); fixed a game-breaking bug with the boss battle
  • v. 002 - fixed cocoons' positions
  • v. 003 - fixed NPC colliders to improve their interaction
  • v. 004 - fixed (again) a critical bug with cutscene and boss battle; changed the speed of blood pools' destruction; made them more visible to ease the playthrough
  • v. 005 - fixed shader of boss; fixed the number in credits; fixed the Grasshopper collider
